Uses of Class
User

    • Uses of User in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User RedditDB.addUser(java.lang.String name)
      Add a user with the given name to the database and return it if a user with the given name does not already exist; else return null.
      User RedditDB.findUser(java.lang.String name)
      Search the database for a user with the given name and return the information if found; else return null.
      User Post.getUser()
      Returns the user who created this post.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<User> RedditDB.getUsers()
      Returns a copy of the list of users; the list itself should not be exposed.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Post> RedditDB.getFrontpage(User user)
      Get all the posts to be displayed on the front page of a particular user and return them.
      java.util.List<Post> RedditDB.getFrontpage(User user, java.lang.String subreddit)
      Get all the posts from the specified subreddit to be displayed on the front page of a particular user and return them.
      Constructors in <Unnamed> with parameters of type User 
      Constructor and Description
      Post(User user, java.lang.String subreddit, PostType type, java.lang.String title)
      Constructs a post with the specified attributes as applicable.
